message: 岬にある遺跡だ。
There's nobody here, and there's no sign of any shady rituals going on either.
岬の突端にある遺跡だ。
マーシュ老人がこの世にない今となっては、この遺跡を訪れる人間も他にいるまい。
A cold wind from the sea blows around the Ruins, and the ancient relics, now unseen by anyone, are quietly heading down the path to ruin.

name: Gardner
message: We troublemakers will step out for a bit.
Call me when it's time to go home.

name: Cordelia
message: It's cold......
遺跡にはまるで人を寄せつけるのを拒むかのように、冷たい風が吹き付けている。
There are no obstacles around to block the wind, and the icy wind mercilessly sucks the warmth from my body.

name: Gardner
message: I'm gonna go wander around for a bit.
These days, I'm not really interested in the Ruins anymore.

name: Thomas
message: Don't go doing things on your own, it makes me look like I'm in the way.
Feels like I'm getting in the way between you two.

name: Gardner
message: If that's what you think, why don't you go wander around over there too？

name: Thomas
message: Aren't you overthinking it too much？
These two sleep in the same Bed together every night, after all.

name: Gardner
message: Then do whatever you want.

name: Thomas
message: Got it.
Hurry up, will ya? It's freezing here, I can't stand it.

name: Gardner
message: Call me when you're leaving.
I'm not gonna let you leave me behind.
The columns made of a black stone with a slimy gloss surrender themselves to the slow waves of collapse, without anyone questioning them.
The stone pillars, with a dark, slimy-looking sheen, seem to resemble the style seen in temples scattered across the islands of Greece.
But these Ruins couldn't possibly have been brought over from Greece.
Philip was trading with countries in Asia and Africa, so these Ruins must have been brought from there too...
As a layman, I don't have enough knowledge to back up that hypothesis.
Even Gardner, the expert, is puzzled, so there's no way I could solve this mystery.
I wonder what kind of connection there is between the Ruins and the huge amount of gold Philip obtained. Did the people who worshipped these Ruins give gold to Philip?
It's a structure that seems to be a Temple, with a majestic and somewhat intimidating atmosphere.
I wonder if the consciousness of the people who worshipped this building as a key part of their faith is dwelling here-the sight of it even stirs fear in me.
Marsh said that by bringing these Ruins to Arkham, Philip made quite a fortune.
Sure, bringing something like this here couldn’t have been easy, so I guess they were expecting a decent reward…
Around the Ruins, where the cold wind howls, you can’t even spot a single bird flying in the sky, let alone any people.
Around the Ruins where the cold wind blows fiercely, you can't even spot a single bird flying in the sky, let alone any humans.
The sound of waves crashing against the cliff just below is such a deafening noise that it seems to make the lonely atmosphere of the cape even more intense.
Surrounded by massive Ruins and hearing the terrifying roar of the waves, I'm reminded once again just how small I really am.

name: Thomas
message: That was pretty quick, huh.
Are you already done with everything？

name: Gardner
message: Did you get to talk at your own pace？
You don't have to worry about us, you know. It's okay for you two to spend more time alone together, you know？

name: Cordelia
message: Sorry for making you both worry about me.
You　really　don't　have　to　worry　about　that　anymore.

name: Cordelia
message: The wind's really strong... I feel like I'm gonna get blown away.

name: Cordelia
message: ...Even though you went out of your way to be considerate.
I don't know what I should talk about.

name: Jonathan
message: ...Not in a place like this.
I'll go get Thomas and the professor.

name: Cordelia
message: It looks like I ended up making Gardner worry about me for no reason.

name: Jonathan
message: He did that on his own, so don't worry about it.
This is the first time we've been alone together like this during the day.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah......

name: Cordelia
message: Hey, Jonathan......

name: Jonathan
message: Actually, I stopped by the Fish Scale Inn earlier and talked with Mrs. Hudson.

name: Cordelia
message: With Hudson-san？
Why are you telling me something like that?

name: Jonathan
message: I figured Hudson might know some stories about when you were a kid.

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder.
It's not like that person is even from this village, and I don't think it's been that long since they came here.

name: Jonathan
message: But we don't have any other ideas.
If there’s even a little chance, I just gotta give it a shot.

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah......

name: Jonathan
message: Tonight, after I stop by the lady's place, I'll go to Gilman House. I'll try talking to the lady.

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder what Hans meant by what he said.
I can't believe I'm a 'miko'.

name: Jonathan
message: I have no clue either.
Since they're called shrine maidens, maybe there's some kind of religious meaning behind it...

name: Cordelia
message: Are you talking about that Church？
I feel really awful whenever I go there.

name: Jonathan
message: You don't have any connection at all to Dagon or that priest called Nai, do you？

name: Cordelia
message: Yeah, as far as I know.
I don't know about my foster parents, so maybe they took me along when I was a kid.

name: Jonathan
message: Maybe those unpleasant memories from back then are unconsciously making you feel disgusted by that Church.

name: Cordelia
message: I wonder if that's even possible.
Because of memories you don't even know you have, you start hating the Church without even realizing it.

name: Jonathan
message: I can't say it's impossible.
Anyway, this means we've just started to understand a little bit about your past.

name: Cordelia
message: What do you think about Marsh？

name: Jonathan
message: What do you mean？
何が言いたいんだい。

name: Cordelia
message: I knew it, it's our fault that happened...

name: Jonathan
message: No use regretting it now.
Besides, Marsh was always scared of something.

name: Jonathan
message: I’ve known for a long time that it would end up like this someday.
More importantly, what kind of secret did she want to keep from us so badly that she’d go that far?

name: Cordelia
message: I'm scared......

name: Cordelia
message: マーシュさんを殺した犯人は誰にも咎められず、村を　　　　　　　　堂々と歩いているのね。

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, that's right.

name: Cordelia
message: You know, I think I'm next.　　　　　　　　I mean, right? Marsh got killed because he tried to help Jonathan and the others.

name: Jonathan
message: I won't let you do that！
Cordelia, from now on, try not to be alone as much as possible.

name: Cordelia
message: That's impossible.
At　night,　I　end　up　all　alone,　you　know.

name: Jonathan
message: From now on, let's go to Gilman House every night.
If you're okay with it.

name: Cordelia
message: Jonathan, you remember the promise you made to me, right?

name: Jonathan
message: Which promise？
I　can't　remember　if　I　make　too　many　promises.

name: Cordelia
message: You're such a meanie.

name: Cordelia
message: You promised to help me find out why I was brought to Arkham, remember？

name: Jonathan
message: Ah, that story.

name: Cordelia
message: How should I go about investigating this, I wonder.
The villagers won't even really talk to us.

name: Jonathan
message: Yeah, we'll just have to try asking someone who's not from the village......
